title: What's in the SWAG bag for Watching Worlds at the Cinema?
body: Just saying if there aren't good lollies I'm not going.

replies.body: I hear they give some pretty mint crayons

I just want like. A Keychain. A Poster of Worlds logo or the League Logo or something like that. (Can't really fit posters in a bag that easily though). an Edible Cho'Gath (World eats Cho'Gath) and something mint. Probably the crayons.

Can't go wrong with the crayons man. They don't disappoint..

You're lucky you're close to those events though.. I'm more North where League is barely known.
There are at least 20 players per school in Victoria lol
Hi Guys, there will be a skin in the show bag plus some other goodies.

> [{quoted}](name=GeneralCoxy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=E0xx8Ajv,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-10-07T22:49:24.723+0000)
>
> Hi Guys, there will be a skin in the show bag plus some other goodies.

'other goodies' 
HMMMMM
Where is this event again? (I live in South Australia, Murray Bridge so the closet location would be nice)
only 1 event in SA and its at norwood from what i've read. at hoyts cinema.
